special_text:
As long as you control three or more creatures, Yan Lei's abilities cost an additional [+2] to activate.
[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Soldiers you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
[-3]: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a Soldier card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
[-10]: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain flying, vigilance and double strike until end of turn.
